global.capped_job_points: Your Job Points are now capped.
global.capped_merit_points: Your Merit Points are now capped.
global.flavor_text: <1>You have a great sense of humor.</1> <10>Your enthusiasm is refreshing.</10> <11>You're incredibly thoughtful.</11> <12>You have a fantastic sense of lockstyle.</12> <13>You always make people feel welcome.</13> <14>You're full of great ideas.</14> <15>You have an amazing work ethic.</15> <16>Your confidence is inspiring.</16> <17>You're always so helpful.</17> <18>Your job mastery is impressive-you're a true expert!</18> <19>You always know how to strategize perfectly in battle.</19> <2>You're a great listener.</2> <20>Your gear is top-notch; you really know how to optimize your character!</20> <21>You're always there to back up the party when things get tough.</21> <22>You make raids and missions look easy.</22> <23>Your timing with abilities is flawless.</23> <24>The way you handle aggro is amazing-you never let us down.</24> <25>Your knowledge of the game is outstanding.</25> <26>You're the glue that holds this alliance together.</26> <27>Your dedication to leveling your job is truly inspiring.</27> <28>Your DPS output is insane; you're a powerhouse in every fight.</28> <29>You're so good at coordinating group tactics and keeping us organized.</29> <3>You light up the room.</3> <30>The way you manage your macros is super smooth-never a missed step.</30> <31>You always find the perfect balance between offense and defense.</31> <32>Your ability to multi-task in intense fights is amazing.</32> <33>You're always up for helping others; you're a true team player.</33> <34>You look stunning in that lockstyle.</34> <4>Your creativity is inspiring.</4> <5>You have a contagious smile.</5> <6>Your positivity is infectious.</6> <7>You bring out the best in people.</7> <8>You have a heart of gold.</8> <9>You're a wonderful friend.</9>

info.introduction: I am Vana, your personal Helper.
info.name: Vana

global.other_party_joined_alliance: A party has joined the alliance.
global.other_party_left_alliance: A party has left the alliance.
global.party_low_mp: It looks like ${member} could use a ${refresh}.

global.reminder_plate: Another Shiny Ra'Kaznarian Plate should be available now.
global.reraise_check: You do not have Reraise on.
global.reraise_wears_off: Your Reraise effect has worn off.
global.sparkolade_reminder: Don't forget to spend your Sparkolades.
global.sublimation_charged: Sublimation is now fully charged and ready to use.
global.vorseal_wearing: You have about 10 minutes left on your Vorseal effect.
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: You are now the alliance leader.
global.you_are_now_party_leader: You are now the party leader.
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party has joined an alliance.
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your party has left the alliance.
